game.name: Gods vs Horrors
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 《신들의 재앙: 오토 체스》에서 서사적인 신들의 전쟁을 경험하세요! 고대 신화 속 강력한 신들을 모집하고, 그들을 업그레이드하고 강화하여 무결한 전술을 배치하고, 천변만화하는 강력한 조합을 창조하세요! 신들을 이끌고 우주의 대공포에 맞서 싸워 지구를 방어하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A drafting roguelike focused on synergies, scaling, and positioning. Recruit Gods from different mythologies, buff and upgrade them, arrange them in perfect formation, and defend the Earth from cosmic horrors!

reviewHighlights.text: Encountered a few bugs on steam deck which were kinda annoying but other than that it is a chill game that does what is advertised. It's fine. Buy on...
One of the best single-player Battlegrounds games out there, with a significant list of pantheons and synergies to pick from. Every hero has great art...
